name: 60 Seconds: Bunker Escape
description:
A project made for the CMGT Jam - Block B 22/23, made by:

  • Bauke van Leeuwen
  • Seth Cohen
  • Erick Divin
  • Rens Linnemans

"60 Seconds: Bunker Escape" is a fast-paced, survival-horror game set in a dilapidated underground bunker. The player takes on the role of a scientist who, along with their team, was conducting experiments on a mysterious tree that has suddenly begun to mutate. With only 60 seconds to spare, the player must search the cramped and dark chambers of the bunker to gather all the essential items needed to escape before the tree mutates completely and unleashes chaos.

As they explore the bunker, the player will encounter locked doors. They must use the items they find along the way to open locks and find their way to safety. With every moment that passes, the mutations of the tree become more apparent and the threat to their survival grows.

Can you escape the bunker before it's too late? Play and find out!
